detail_desc: T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed section at the front, a mesh racer back and a wide elastic hem with embossed text. Medium support.
Calf-length, V-neck dress in mesh with a frill trim at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Smocking at the waist and a skirt with smocking and a flounced hem. Partly lined in jersey.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets and concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Chino shorts in stretch cotton twill. Regular, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets.
Short-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flounced skirt.
Ankle-length trousers in a soft Tencel™ lyocell dobby weave with elastication and a decorative drawstring with tassels at the waist, and side pockets.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and embroidered appliqués on the knees.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Basic, long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an extra-firm, tight fit that focuses on the thighs. The tights create pressure on the legs that is highest at the hems and is gradually reduced towards the top to aid circulation. The special design and high elastane content help the tights to retain their effect and properties over a long period. Elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, mesh key pocket in the waistband and reflective details.
Cold shoulder top in smocked jersey with narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves with frill trims and a frill trim at the top and hem.
X-cut playsuit in a viscose weave with a flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist. elastication at the back and short, wide legs.
Fitted, quilted down jacket with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped front pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Leather ankle boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop front and back, and welt seams around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Cable-knit jumper in a soft wool blend containing some alpaca. Wide fit at the top and fitted to the hem with wide ribbing. Wide sleeves with narrow ribbed cuffs.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fluffy yarn with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Small imitation leather shoulder bag with a zip at the top and wide, detachable nylon shoulder strap with metal carabiner hooks. Size 1x15x22 cm.
V-neck tunic in an airy weave with a stand-up collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Set with a hat and mittens in a fine-knit cotton blend. Hat with embroidery on the front, ear appliqués at the top and a ribbed hem. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Size 2-6M without thumbs.

Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with embroidery. V-neck, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Top in printed, slub-textured sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut top in jersey made from a cotton blend with beaded embroidery at the top and short sleeves.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and legs with seams and ribbed hems.
Fully lined sports swimsuit in a narrow cut at the top with a visible zip and long tab at the back for easy zipping and unzipping, and high-cut legs.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Collar, buttons down the front and a gently rounded hem.
Small backpack with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Size 11x21x26 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Flared vest top in organic cotton jersey with a frill-trimmed hem.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.
Top in a crêpe weave with a scalloped edge and broderie anglaise at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with a shimmering, double-layered tulle skirt and a decorative bow at the waist. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder and short puff sleeves. Jersey-lined skirt. .
Scarf knitted in soft cashmere with ribbing on the short sides. Size 50x175 cm.
Top in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Bracelets in various designs. Adjustable length.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist that has a button fastening at one side and decorative buttons at the other. Zip fly, side pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.
Long-sleeved polo shirt in stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with a collar and button placket. Slim Fit.
Hat in soft, rib-knit cotton with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Vest top in slub linen jersey with a V-neck, low-cut back and gently rounded hem.
Cotton twill shoes with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Seersucker dress in a narrow cut at the top with a gentle flare to the hem. Elasticated top, narrow shoulder straps and a rounded hem.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with a lined, drawstring hood, button placket, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Lace shorts with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Hat in braided paper straw with a wide grosgrain band. Width of brim 7 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Sandals with covered heels and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Cropped, sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a twisted detail at the hem.
Satin ties. One in a solid colour and one patterned. Width 6.5 cm.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Metal earrings with one hoop-shaped pendant and one rod-shaped pendant. Length 3.5 cm.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra with an elasticated hem and elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with imitation suede details and a quilted shaft with lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Imitation leather trousers with slim legs and a regular waist. Zip fly and button, decorative zips at the top and quilted sections at the knees.
Short, fitted cardigan in a fine knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Long cardigan in transparent mesh with wide, 3/4-length sleeves, high slits in the sides and no fasteners.
Trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and front and back pockets.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft jersey with long sleeves.
Coat in sturdy, felted fabric with notch lapels, a concealed press-stud at the front, patch pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton and modal jersey with a wide neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Long wrap dress in an airy weave with a V-neck, double-layered top and narrow shoulder straps that are twisted at the back. Seam and a tie at the waist and a skirt with slits. Partly lined.

Blouse in soft lace made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar that has gathers all round and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and string back. The polyamide content of the briefs is recycled.

Short-sleeved playsuit in a cotton weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, a seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist and short, wide legs. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, inside-out jacquard knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.

V-neck playsuit in a viscose weave with lace details, a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the neckline and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs with wrapover sides. Unlined.
Pencil case with a zip at the top. Lined. Size 5x6x20 cm.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric. Hoodie with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a V-neck racer back.
Metal earrings in various sizes. Diameter from 2.3 cm to 7.6 cm.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is partly recycled.
